name: Dinner Tonight: Spinach Strawberry Salad
description: I picked up some strawberries up at the farmer's market and I just couldn't wait to get them home. Real strawberries—the ones that come in early summer—taste so much outlandishly better than what you can find in the grocery store.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the shallot and raspberry vinegar. Slowly whisk in the oil.
Rip the spinach leaves into bite size pieces. Toss in a large bowl. Crumble the blue cheese on top and add the sliced strawberries. Gently mix together.
Pour in the dressing. Season with salt and pepper.
